# Discord Chat Analysis for ðŸ’»â”‚developers

## 1. Summary
The chat primarily revolves around memecoin-related gaming applications in Hyperfy. 3rdEyeVisuals is developing a slot machine app and shared their workflow for bundling .hyp files for iterative testing. Ash referenced a previous project called "Fallen," a PVP game where players could stake HYPER tokens, battle other players to win their tokens, and withdraw winnings. This sparked discussion about gambling mechanics and game concepts. 3rdEyeVisuals mentioned successfully implementing base functionality for their slot machine application. The conversation also touched on different development workflows, with Ash mentioning they build directly in-world and download only when needed for sharing, which 3rdEyeVisuals considered an impressive approach.

## 2. FAQ
Q: Anyone create a memecoin related app yet? Like blackjack or poker. Where you can play with a couple buddies. (asked by 3rdEyeVisuals) A: Ash shared Fallen as an example, a PVP world where users stake HYPER tokens (answered by ash)
Q: How does everyone bundle their .hyp files? (asked by 3rdEyeVisuals) A: ash mentioned they "simply just build stuff in world and download if i need to share" (answered by ash)

## 3. Help Interactions
Helper: ash | Helpee: 3rdEyeVisuals | Context: Looking for examples of memecoin gaming apps | Resolution: Shared Fallen (https://fallen.hyperfy.xyz/), a PVP game with token staking mechanics
Helper: ash | Helpee: 3rdEyeVisuals | Context: Asking about .hyp file bundling workflows | Resolution: Shared an alternative approach of building in-world and downloading only when needed

## 4. Action Items
Technical: Implement slot machine functionality | Description: Continue development of memecoin-based slot machine | Mentioned By: 3rdEyeVisuals
Technical: Improve .hyp file bundling workflow | Description: Enhance current process to automatically create JSON files | Mentioned By: 3rdEyeVisuals
Feature: Create a "Wipeout" version of token-based gaming | Description: PVE game with prize pool similar to Fallen but less intense than PVP | Mentioned By: 3rdEyeVisuals
Feature: GTA-style game with guns | Description: Clone and customize existing mechanics with GTA vibes | Mentioned By: Pete
